title: The Book of Little Folk: Faery Stories and Poems from Around the World
description: Award-winning author-artist Lauren Mills has brought together a total of thirteen stories and sixteen poems of the little folk, illustrated with her radiant watercolor paintings. Retellings include favorites such as "Thumbelina" and "Tom Thumb", and lesser-known, but equally fascinating pieces such as the Ojibwa tale "Leelinau", and Swaziland's "The Moss-Green Princess". 120 watercolor illustrations.
author: Lauren A. Mills
